InstructionData.Title: Modified
InstructionData.Author: Renrek
InstructionData.Instructions:
alias sensor d0 alias vAngle r0 alias hAngle r1
# Panels have a 15 offset # Effective max panel angle (90-15 = 75) # Ratio caused by range (75+75 = 150/100) define hOffset 270 define vOffset 75 define vRatio 1.5 define solarHash -539224550
Start: yield
# Setting horizontal (0-360 input) l hAngle sensor Horizontal sub hAngle hOffset hAngle sb solarHash Horizontal hAngle
# Setting vertical (0-100% input) l vAngle sensor Vertical sub vAngle vOffset vAngle div vAngle vAngle vRatio sb solarHash Vertical vAngle
j Start
